Prayer times were calculated based on University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi criterion.
Qibla Hour is the time when the sun is at the direction of Qibla (Makkah)
or opposite of it (times in bracket).
Prepared by: Alhabib - Coloring with Islam
- www.al-habib.info
